name: Block Dasher
description:
Evil non-cubic shapes are going to invade the world!

Go on an adventure with your blocky friends and help him ask kings from different kingdoms some help!

In Block Dasher, you'll solve different puzzles in many places, from a calm garden full of trees and vegetation to a hot lava-filled volcano.

Controls:

  • Computer:

            Movement: AWSD / Arrow Keys

            Camera rotation: Q (left) E (right)

  • Phone:

            Movement: Swipe

            Camera rotation: Rotation buttons displayed in the UI
